name: Exagen Inc.
description: Exagen Inc. is a biotechnology company that specializes in the development and commercialization of innovative diagnostic tests and solutions for autoimmune diseases. Founded in 2016 and headquartered in Vista, California, Exagen is dedicated to providing healthcare professionals with accurate and actionable insights to better diagnose and manage patients with complex autoimmune conditions such as systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) and rheumatoid arthritis (RA). The company's flagship product, AVISE®, is a proprietary test that measures specific biomarkers to assist clinicians in making informed decisions regarding patient care. Exagen's commitment to enhancing patient outcomes is reflected in its investment in research and development, which aims to further expand its diagnostic offerings and improve the understanding of autoimmune diseases. By leveraging advanced laboratory technologies and a robust clinical research framework, Exagen strives to empower healthcare providers with the tools necessary for precision medicine in the field of rheumatology. The company's mission is not only to provide high-quality diagnostic solutions but also to contribute to the broader understanding of autoimmune diseases through collaboration with the medical community and ongoing educational initiatives.
